messages.title: My Priorities for Skipton and Ripon
ONLY A MAJORITY GOVERNMENT CAN GET ON WITH THE COUNTRY'S PRIORITIES
messages.content: Better hospitals. Safer streets. Improved schools. LET'S GET ON WITH OUR PRIORITIES.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supports jobs and economic growth, meets small business owners, helped secure over £4.6m in Local Growth Funding.
Campaigned to keep Castleberg Hospital open, raised local concerns about service provision in Craven, worked for the hospital to be reopened.
Led the campaign for further investment in broadband, resulted in phase 3 for the superfast broadband roll-out with £20.5m of public funding.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The end of this election, we’ll either get a Conservative majority – or a hung parliament.

issues.education: English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.
issues.health: Government plans billions for hospital projects.

contactInformation.address: Paragon CC, 76 Wellington St, Leeds, LS1 2AY

quotes.text: Government plans billions for hospital projects.
End of the soft prison sentence.
English schools to get three-year £14bn funding boost.

images.caption: Julian Smith with what appears to be local business owners.
